sentences.sContent: We must encourage the planting of new trees and preserve our existing woodlands.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须鼓励栽种新树木，同时也要保护现有的林地。

sentences.sContent: ...he wants to preserve the tradition of the neighborhood ice-cream truck...
...countries that overcut forests actually do better than those that preserve their forests...
...We write to preserve our family histories so our children and grandchildren can learn and appreciate their heritage...
...Only a tiny fraction of Americans change any behaviors in an effort to preserve their privacy...

synos.tran: 保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品

remMethod.val: pre(前面) ＋ serve(服务) → 提前提供服务 → 保护； 保存

words.tran: 防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的
可保存的；可保管的；能储藏的
保护者，保护人；保护剂，防腐剂；储藏柜

trans.tranOther: to save something or someone from being harmed or destroyed
